cleaned_text: Free COVID-19 testing is available at collection sites located throughout Southern Nevada. Safe, effective and free COVID-19 vaccines are available at several convenient locations. No-cost, prescription treatment options for COVID-19 are available to those who qualify. A variety of COVID-19 fact sheets, posters, signs and social media posts are available for downloading and sharing. Most materials are available in both English and Spanish. The Health District may be able to provide a COVID-19 vaccination clinic at your community event or location. Submit a request through the form linked below. Accessibility Tools
